          <title>
            <string language="en">Formation of caprolactam through condensation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anordnung des Caprolactams durch Kondensation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formation de caprolactame par la condensation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação do caprolactam com a condensação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione di caprolattame con condensazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός caprolactam μέσω της συμπύκνωσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación del caprolactam con la condensación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the formation of the monomer, caprolactam, from 6-aminohexanoic acid through a condensation reaction.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">caprolactam</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">condensation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">monomer</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Anordnung der Monomere,
Caprolactam, von der Säure 6-aminohexanoic durch eine 
Kondensationreaktion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la formation du 
monomère, caprolactame, de l'acide 6-aminohexanoic par une réaction 
de condensation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a formação do monomer,
caprolactam, do ácido 6-aminohexanoic com uma reação da 
condensação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la formazione del 
monomero, caprolattame, da acido 6-aminohexanoic con una reazione di 
condensazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει το σχηματισμό του 
μονομερούς, caprolactam, από το 6- aminohexanoic οξύ μέσω 
μιας αντίδρασης συμπύκνωσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la formación del 
monomer, caprolactam, del ácido 6-aminohexanoic con una reacción de 
la condensación.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kondensation</string>
